dnf_game.tests.pysdl2_animated_sprite_test.tile_shuffler(w, h)[source]¶

Create the xy coordinates in the possible range and shuffle them.

Args:
w (int): width of the tileset h (int): height of the tileset
Returns:
list of tuples with coordinates (x, y)
